The repository consists of Java code. [MainActivity.java:6-12], [NotificationHelper.java:9-43], [SMSReceiver.java:11-34]

The `showNotification` method in [NotificationHelper.java:14-27] displays a notification. It takes the context, a title, and a message as input. It first calls `createNotificationChannel` to ensure the notification channel is created. Then, it builds a notification with a small icon, the provided title and message, sets the priority to high, and enables auto-cancel. Finally, it retrieves the `NotificationManager` and displays the notification.
